live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter and will be working to restore service as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
36112.summary: Some customers in the Summerwood area of Sherwood Park are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36112.title: Apr 10 – Sherwood Park (Summerwood) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
36089.summary: Some customers in the Arbor Creek area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36089.title: Apr 10 – Saskatoon (Arbor Creek) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
